mapper.select: SELECT EXERCISE_IDX AS exerciseIdx , EXERCISE_NAME AS exerciseName , EXERCISE_PARTS AS exerciseParts , EXERCISE_PICTURES AS exercisePictures , EXERCISE_VIDEO AS exerciseVideo , HOWTO_EXERCISE AS howtoExercise , CAUTION AS caution , REPETITION AS repetition , SET_COUNT AS setCount , REST_TIME AS restTime FROM EXERCISE_INFORMATION_TB WHERE 1=1
